name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At present, the anti-fraud publicity group in the villages near the Nanyang Midi Music Festival is urging villagers to quickly hand in their zero-yuan shopping items to the village office.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Coincidentally, Guangzhou Zengcheng No. 1 Middle School recently spent a huge amount of money to purchase security inspection equipment and security inspection doors to check whether students secretly bring mobile phones, headphones, power banks, etc. into the campus.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: According to AFP, the Wagner Corps had previously purchased two observation satellites and image intelligence from a Chinese company.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The video of the free purchase at Midi in Nanyang was exposed. The videographer accused a woman of stealing a computer. The woman said that there was no one there and she took it because there was no one.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On October 2, a zero-yuan purchase incident also occurred at a wedding in Xuzhou, Jiangsu. The venue set up by the wedding company at night was emptied by fellow villagers overnight. "It was set up at 8 pm, and there was nothing left the next day." "You can't see any traces of the setting up at the site (which was moved)."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of October 5, Nanyang.com issued an announcement that it would launch an investigation into Zhang, who spread the rumor that the cables were stolen. Zhang said that he had been listed in the announcement, so he wanted to clarify that he had indeed written a cable in the on-site report, and found it after three days of investigation. The electrician did not count it properly. He deeply apologized for the inconvenience caused to his hometown.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On October 6, Shenzhen Overseas Chinese Town Middle School also announced that it had placed a security scanner at the school gate.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 6, Hu Xijin expressed his views on the Nanyang zero-yuan shopping incident.
Midi volunteers who had their belongings stolen were furious

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 6, a Midi volunteer who lost more than 10,000 items recounted his experience: the on-site security was not in place, so the villagers went directly into the work shed to get the items. He stayed in Nanyang for three days to get the items back, all at his own expense, and the police only showed up at the beginning.
Now the screen is full of "good news" from various big Vs, blaming the victims, and how wronged and pitiful Nanyang is, but no one pays attention to the people who actually lost the items.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 6, the 2023 Nobel Peace Prize was awarded to Narges Mohammadi for her fight against the oppression of women in Iran and for the promotion of human rights and freedoms for all.
Her courageous fight has come at a great personal cost to her. The Iranian regime has arrested her 13 times, convicted her five times, and sentenced her to a total of 31 years in prison and 154 lashes.
She remains in prison to this day.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Patriotic Big V: The zero-yuan purchase in Nanyang was taken advantage of by others, causing fellow villagers to go to the zero-yuan purchase without knowing the truth. It is really manipulating public opinion to cover up Japan's discharge of nuclear waste waterğŸ˜…

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On October 2, in an amusement park in Hanzhong, Shaanxi, a woman fell into the water and shook the suspension bridge frantically, trying to shake everyone else on the bridge off. The children on the suspension bridge were trembling with fear. This is also a microcosm of the times to some extent.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: @zxpsyx It seems that I really misunderstood her

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On October 5, a female host from Nanyang talked about the 0-yuan purchase of Midi music, tearfully accusing someone of deliberately defaming Nanyang. However, the embarrassing thing was that the host accidentally revealed a situation while complaining: the secretary of the Nanyang Municipal Party Committee was at the scene when the music festival ended, but failed to stop the Nanyang villagers from purchasing music for free.....

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, the Yichun Municipal Government issued a public opinion solicitation, and this year's heating price will increase by 12%. However, citizens found that every time they submitted their opinions, the verification code error was displayed, and they could not submit at all. The phone could not be dialed, and the email could not be sent.
And the list of people who were announced for the hearing did not include any members of the public, which caused a lot of criticism from the citizens.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the afternoon of October 5, at the gate of the U.S. Consulate General in Shanghai, a man was taken to the roadside by the police because he could not show valid documents and wanted to enter the embassy. During the process, the man resisted fiercely and was forcibly pushed into the police car and taken away.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 6, the Shanghai Police-Citizen Express reported that a girl was lost while playing at the beach on the evening of the 4th.
According to the girl's father, he and his daughter were playing on the beach that day. During the process, he returned to get his phone and left the girl at S Hatanshan. More than ten minutes later, he returned to the beach but did not find his daughter.
According to the surveillance, the girl waited for 10 minutes and then walked to the water alone. After that, she fell by the water and disappeared in the waves.
The search and rescue work is still ongoing.
